mapper.select: SELECT RNUM, FREE_NUM, MEM_NUM, FREE_SUBJECT, FREE_TITLE, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(FREE_CONTENT, 10000, 1) AS FREE_CONTENT, FREE_VIEWS, FREE_REGDATE FROM ( SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(FREE_BOARD PK_FREE_BOARD)*/ ROWNUM AS RNUM, FREE_NUM, MEM_NUM, FREE_SUBJECT, FREE_TITLE, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(FREE_CONTENT, 10000, 1) AS FREE_CONTENT, FREE_VIEWS, FREE_REGDATE FROM FREE_BOARD ) WHERE BETWEEN #{START} AND #{AND}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_BOARD ( FREE_NUM, MEM_NUM, FREE_SUBJECT, FREE_TITLE, FREE_CONTENT ) VALUES ( #{FREE_NUM}, #{MEM_NUM}, #{FREE_SUBJECT}, #{FREE_TITLE}, to_clob(#{FREE_CONTENT}) )
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(( SELECT /*+index_desc(FREE_BOARD PK_FREE_BOARD)*/ FREE_NUM FROM FREE_BOARD WHERE ROWNUM=1), 0)+1 FREE_NUM FROM DUAL
SELECT FREE_NUM, MEM_NUM, FREE_SUBJECT, FREE_TITLE, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(FREE_CONTENT, 10000, 1) AS FREE_CONTENT, FREE_VIEWS, FREE_REGDATE FROM FREE_BOARD WHERE FREE_NUM = #{FREE_NUM}
mapper.update: UPDATE FREE_BOARD SET FREE_SUBJECT = #{FREE_SUBJECT}, FREE_TITLE = #{FREE_TITLE}, FREE_CONTENT = to_clob(#{FREE_CONTENT}) WHERE FREE_NUM = #{FREE_NUM} AND MEM_NUM = #{MEM_NUM}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FREE_BOARD WHERE FREE_NUM = #{FREE_NUM} AND MEM_NUM = #{MEM_NUM}
